entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:26 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
